mapper.insert: insert into user (id, username, birthday, sex, address) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select id, username, birthday, sex, address from user
